article_title: Good News And Bad News About Value Based Healthcare

article_metadata.author: Leah Binder

og.description: An important event yesterday signaled the beginning of the end for the much-maligned “fee-for-service” payment system in the U.S. healthcare system. That’s the system by which doctors and other providers get paid for every service they deliver, regardless of whether it’s necessary or does any good for the patient. Unchecked, [...]
